Text: hey can anyone help me with an issue? When I download these 720p files i try to play them in VLC Media Player and the audio works but the video keeps sticking. Anyone got any suggestions? Thanks in advance
trini - Windows media player doesn't like many formats... you need the correct codecs to play this format. Either download K-lite codec pack or get VLC player from Videolan.org
oops.. mis-read yours... possible cause is overstretching memory use
PaPaJ0 - Thanks for your responses. What i overstretching memory use? Sorry if I sound like a noob. :)
